description: Be forewarned, once you try the Peak to Creek Short for men, all other shorts in your workout collection might pale in comparison. This bluesign®-certified short is made with a heathered twill fabric that's soft and stretchy for unbeatable style and movement. Plus, it has a soft waistband for security and comfort where you want it most. To top it all off, they have now added in a secure zip pocket, so you can stash your cards and keys with total ease.
name: Prana Peak to Creek Shorts, 9" Inseam - Mens
